title: Sponsored Team INFLUXE GAMING Looking for Plat 1+  ALL ROLES
body:
Hello im LaMarcusAldridge Manager/Owner of Influxe Gaming, Little about myself, I placed top 16 CLCS with Portland State In Season 3, Ive Coached Various Diamond Teams Over the course of my Career, Now I've Decided to Make a team and help put a solid 5 group together and Try to Build a Brand (Merchandise Etc) and try to get to the Challenger Series, Team Currently Has 2 Sponsors So now it comes down to me putting the Team Together.

Team Sponsors
@MadCatz
@CGE Clothing
@The Green Planet
-In Talks with NoScopeGlasses

Manager: LaMarcusAldridge
Coach: OPEN
Analyst: OPEN

Support: OPEN
Top: OPEN
Jungle: OPEN
ADC: OPEN
Support: OPEN

-----Basic Information about the team-----

Looking to play during the afternoon / evening. As early as 5pm as late as 1am finishing PST. We will talk about dates on which we will practice as we get a set 5 together. I expect people to be mature people. Therefore you must be at least 17 years of age to apply to the team. In addition, by applying for this team you should demonstrate complete dedication and loyalty to this team. This team has goals of competing in tournaments and also committing time to being the best it can be as a unit , while also growing individually. When starting this team I would ask that players( those applying ) to have flexible schedules. Due to the fact, we all have lives outside of Summoner's Rift I would ask everyone to be open with their schedules until we work out set practices times that work with all of the players once the roster is confirmed. There will be practices at least 3 or 4 days out of the week. THIS IS A SPONSORED AND SUPPORTED TEAM Once a Roster is set I Will go into More Detail With the Chosen. With that being said, a level of serious and professionalism will come with joining this team. However with the proper performance from the team this could turn into a huge opportunity for all of the players and staff. I the team captain would like to start the application/ tryout process as soon as possible.

-----Requirements for people applying for Player positions on the team-----
1. Must be 18 years of age or older
2. Plat 1 or Higher
3. Must be willing to download any chat program the team decides to use (Skype, TS, Curse, or Raidcall)
4. Must attend at least 4/5 practices during the week
5. Must be able to communicate effectively with team members
6. Must be able to vocalize any issues you are having with game play
7. Must play a decent amount of solo/duo queue during off days
8. Must effectively aim to broaden champ pool based on team comp needs.
9. Must be able to both give and take criticism in a constructive manner
10. Must be able to work with coaching staff to effectively improve game play
11. Should be capable of shot calling (will strengthen chances of making team)
(Interview will be conducting before any final decisions are made )

-----Things that will not be tolerated-----

-Bullying
-Raging during practices
-Blaming a whole game on one person's mistake
-Making Team mates feel uncomfortable
-Racism
-BM towards any enemy team
- Hateful messages
-Missing excessive practices (without legitimate reasons)
-Missing tournaments (without legitimate reasons)
-Arguing with Coaching staff ( Constructive discussions are completely different)
- Arguing with shot callers decisions in the middle of games
(Breaking these rules can result in immediate removal from the team)

-- Player Application---
Age:
Location:
Summoner Name:
Rank This Season:
Rank Last Season:
Primary Role:
Champion Pool For Main Role:
When are you available:
What do you consider to be your strengths:
What do you consider to be your weaknesses:
Why are you looking for a team:
Comfort Shot calling (on a scale of 1-10, 1 =being weak ; 10= being strong ):
What do you expect from your team mates:
Any extra information you would like to give:
Any questions that you have:

Coaching Application
Age:
Location:
Summoner Name:
Rank This Season:
When are you available:
What do you consider to be your strengths:
What do you expect from the team:
Any Extra information I should know about:
Any Questions you might have:

Thank you For Your Time. Looking forward to receiving your applications. Hope to be working with you all soon.

https://twitter.com/InFluxeEsports

replies.body:
Age: 17
Location:  Portland,Oregon
Summoner Name: YowZa MEow
Rank This Season: D5
Rank Last Season: P2
Primary Role: ADC 
Champion Pool For Main Role: I have experience on all ADC's but these or my top 5 as of path 6.4 {{champion:42}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:96}}  In no specific order 
When are you available: | WEEKDAYS : 4pm - SLEEP | WEEKENDS : WAKE - SLEEP | 
What do you consider to be your strengths: communication, experience, lane phase, CS 
What do you consider to be your weaknesses: I don't play enough solo Q, I have been playing too much CS:GO. Kinda been discouraged by a couple of solo Q games. I need to just play normals with friends so at least i'm still playing.
Why are you looking for a team: I like the competitive nature and now that I hit diamond I feel like a team is  great way to get myself to the next level.
Comfort Shot calling (on a scale of 1-10, 1 =being weak ; 10= being strong ):  8 
What do you expect from your team mates: communication, chill, desire, consistency (in game, on time, personality) 
Any extra information you would like to give: ~
Any questions that you have: HOW AWESOME IS OREGON ???

Addded in Game

Age: **18**
Location: **Texas**
Summoner Name: **Shangdi DMW**
Rank This Season: **Diamond 4**
Rank Last Season: **Diamond 5**
Primary Role:** Mid**
****
Champion Pool For Main Role: {{champion:103}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:101}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:26}} (I can play ALL of these at a good level, but I narrow it down for what I think is strong and to play into different matchups
****
When are you available: **3pm - 12pm Weekdays Any time Weekend**
What do you consider to be your strengths:** Strong laning, large champion pool, can play multiple styles (support mids, control mages, etc), good at recognizing gank opportunities, can usually predict where the jungler is based off of game events.**
What do you consider to be your weaknesses: **Usually reliant on being last pick to counter enemy mid/team**
Why are you looking for a team:** Looking for teammates to dynamic queue with and improve to get Masters**
Comfort Shot calling (on a scale of 1-10, 1 =being weak ; 10= being strong ): **5**
What do you expect from your team mates: **Respect towards my calls and humility**
Any extra information you would like to give: **I'd prefer not to shotcall, very good at giving information though**
Any questions that you have: **None**

Age: 17
Location: Kentucky
Summoner Name: InF Roccool
Rank This Season: D 4
Rank Last Season: P 2
Primary Role: Support Or mid
Champion Pool For Main Role: Janna, Braum, Lulu, Annie, Thresh
When are you available: Almost 24/7
What do you consider to be your strengths: I am always positive and looking to improve, also mechanics
What do you consider to be your weaknesses: shot calling xD
Why are you looking for a team:To improve as an individual and a team player
Comfort Shot calling (on a scale of 1-10, 1 =being weak ; 10= being strong ): 7
What do you expect from your team mates: For them to criticize me, and help each other out on the journey to the challenger series
Any extra information you would like to give: I am probably the nicest guy you will ever meet
Any questions that you have: How long will practices be, and when do i start?

Age: 17 (The thread said both 17 and 18 as the age requirement so I'm just being real with you)
Location: Texas, USA
Summoner Name: A53 Eclipse
Rank This Season: Platinum I
Rank Last Season: Diamond 5- Peaked Diamond 4
Primary Role: Jungle
Champion Pool For Main Role: Rek'Sai, Zac, Nidalee, Elise, Lee Sin, Gragas, Etc. (Large champ pool as result of previous 5's experience)
When are you available: Schedule is kinda random, generally free weekdays after 2:30 CST, also generally open weekends after about 1PM CST
What do you consider to be your strengths: Very vocal, positive attitude, mechanically sound on most champions, Strong Warding
What do you consider to be your weaknesses: Sometimes too aggressive
Why are you looking for a team: Previous team disbanded
Comfort Shot calling (on a scale of 1-10, 1 =being weak ; 10= being strong ): 7- I'm not a huge shotcaller, but i'm very vocal- especially with timers and rotations.
What do you expect from your team mates: Positive, Hard-Working, Reliable
Any extra information you would like to give: I'm a quick learner and adapt  well to various playstyles.
Any questions that you have: N/A

What do you expect from your team mates: Strong performance, play making etc
Any extra information you would like to give: Talk about it later
Any questions that you have: Talk about it later

Im the Manager, I dont Coach or Play with The Team, I set up Tournaments,Sponsors,Take Care and Update Website,Make Merchandise, The Coaching Staff/Analysts Will be the one's working with the team, And i'll be there to make sure everybody is happy and in high spirits. Im Here to Bring a solid group of 5 people together who want more then just the Solo Q, People who want to try and make the effort as much as I am putting everything together
Why are you Silver1 looking for Diamond players

Explain it oh wise one

Age: _22_

Location: _**Hawaii**_

Summoner Name:_CPTbrannigan, The Khazix_

Rank This Season: _CPTBrannigan( Platinum 1), The Khazix(Gold 2)_

Rank Last Season: _CPTbrannigan(Diamond 5 decayed from Diamond 2), The Khazix( Diamond 5 decayed to Platinum 3_)

Primary Role: _Jungle_

Champion Pool For Main Role: _Gragas, Elise, Graves, Nidalee, Zac, Udyr, Lee Sin. Depends on play style of team. _

When are you available: _Anytime after 8PM EST_

What do you consider to be your strengths:_ Good mechanics, Good at team fighting/focus, Strong champion pool and being able to adapt, and keeping track of summoner spells and realizing when to gank/push/farm._

What do you consider to be your weaknesses:_ Wave control(when to push/retreat/rotate), Over aggression, and need to improve on ward placement for objectives. (use of tracker's knife.)_

Why are you looking for a team: _Was on a Diamond 1 team last season and looking to get back into the scene and improve even farther this season. _

Comfort Shot calling (on a scale of 1-10, 1 =being weak ; 10= being strong ): _8( Team I was on before it was jungle shotcalling then when transferring to mid game the support started to shot call.)_

What do you expect from your team mates:_ Maturity, a good mindset(looking at the future even after loses. You're not going to play your best every game and progress forward.), communication._

Any extra information you would like to give:_ Currently in the Army in Hawaii so traveling for tournaments will be hard within next year until I leave. 
Any questions that you have: Will ask at a later time._
